summary: The build request explicitly states that all core modules are already fully implemented and that no new requirements are needed. The diff shows various file modifications and one new file (AdvisorPage.tsx), but since there are zero requirements to verify against, there are no missing requirements. However, several new features appear in the diff that go beyond merely confirming existing coverage, including a new API Reference Page, password setup/biometric auth UI, and a getSummaryStatistics hook â€” none of which were requested even implicitly.

hallucinated_features.description: New ApiReferencePage added with interactive 'Run Query' buttons, collapsible return schemas, live JSON response display for four public backend endpoints
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement in the build request asks for an API reference page. The build request states no new requirements are needed and lists only confirmation of existing features.

hallucinated_features.description: New PasswordSetupModal component with SHA-256 hashing, strength indicator, and success confirmation screen
hallucinated_features.reason: Not mentioned in any requirement. The build request explicitly prohibits re-implementing or adding modules beyond the four listed core features.

hallucinated_features.description: BiometricAuthButton component using WebAuthn for biometric authentication
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the build request. Biometric authentication is a new feature not listed among the confirmed existing features.

hallucinated_features.description: New Security and Authentication section on ProfilePage with password setup button and BiometricAuthButton
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of any stated requirement or existing confirmed feature. This is a newly introduced UI section.
No requirement mentions a summary statistics endpoint or hook. This is a new feature not included in the confirmed existing feature list.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend password management functions setUserPassword and verifyUserPassword with UserProfileInput type separation
hallucinated_features.reason: Password management is not listed among the four confirmed core modules the build request says are already live. This represents new backend functionality not requested.
